title: Goods & chattels : the story of Theodor
other_title: Goods and chattels : the story of Theodor

abstract: A single room hut with only a candle for light at night.
description: Robert Voigt recounts his rich family history and their connection to their farm in Beechworth. When his father, Henry, purchased more land, he received, as part of the goods and chattels in the contract, Theodor, a farm labourer. Theodor was a man of vast intelligence and mysterious origins.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002207; The Drought : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2008
